      • getSavingsTarget

        @RequestMapping(value="/{savingstargetId}/savingstargets")
 @ResponseBody
public SavingsTargets getSavingsTarget(@PathVariable(value="savingstargetId")
                                                                                                                 int savingstargetId)
        This request map runs a method that gets a savings target
        Parameters:
        savingstargetId - is a unique ID for a savings target
        Returns:
        a SavingsTargets-object

      • getAllSavingsTargetsForUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/{customerId}/allsavingstargets")
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.List<SavingsTargets> getAllSavingsTargetsForUser(@PathVariable(value="customerId")
                                                                                                                                          int customerId)
        This request map runs a method that gets all savings targets for a customer
        Parameters:
        customerId - is a unique ID for a customer
        Returns:
        a List<> with savings targets for a specified user

      • createSavingsTargets

        @RequestMapping(value="/createsavingstargets/{name}/{customerId}/{kroner}/{oere}")
 @ResponseBody
public boolean createSavingsTargets(@PathVariable(value="name")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                      @PathVariable(value="customerId")
                                                                                                                                      int customerId,
                                                                                                                                      @PathVariable(value="kroner")
                                                                                                                                      java.math.BigInteger kroner,
                                                                                                                                      @PathVariable(value="oere")
                                                                                                                                      int oere)
        This request map runs a method that creates a new savings target
        Parameters:
        name - is a string with the name for the new savings target
        customerId - is a unique ID for a customer
        kroner - is the goal amount (kroner) for the new savings target
        oere - is the goal amount (øre) for the new savings target
        Returns:
        a boolean to see if the savings target was successfully created

      • addToTarget

        @RequestMapping(value="/addtotarget/{accountNo}/{savingsTargetId}/{kroner}/{oere}")
 @ResponseBody
public boolean addToTarget(@PathVariable(value="accountNo")
                                                                                                                              java.lang.String accountNumber,
                                                                                                                              @PathVariable(value="savingsTargetId")
                                                                                                                              int savingsTargetId,
                                                                                                                              @PathVariable(value="kroner")
                                                                                                                              java.math.BigInteger kroner,
                                                                                                                              @PathVariable(value="oere")
                                                                                                                              int oere)
        This request map runs a method that adds an amount of money to a specified savings target
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - is the account number of the account sending money
        savingsTargetId - is a unique ID for a savings target receiving money
        kroner - is the amount of money (kroner) being sent to the savings target
        oere - is the amount of money (øre) being sent to the savings target
        Returns:
        a boolean to see if the transaction was successful

      • subtractFromTarget

        @RequestMapping(value="/subtractfromtarget/{accountNo}/{savingsTargetId}/{kroner}/{oere}")
 @ResponseBody
public boolean subtractFromTarget(@PathVariable(value="accountNo")
                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String accountNumber,
                                                                                                                                            @PathVariable(value="savingsTargetId")
                                                                                                                                            int savingsTargetId,
                                                                                                                                            @PathVariable(value="kroner")
                                                                                                                                            java.math.BigInteger kroner,
                                                                                                                                            @PathVariable(value="oere")
                                                                                                                                            int oere)
        This request map runs a method that subtracts money from a savings target
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - is the account number for the account receiving the money
        savingsTargetId - is a unique ID for a savings target sending money
        kroner - is the amount of money (kroner) being sent from the savings target
        oere - is the amount of money (øre) being sent from the savings target
        Returns:
        a boolean to see if the transaction was successful
